Package com.bigbross.bossa

Interface Summary
TimeSource This interface represents a time source used by the Bossa engine.
 

Class Summary
Bossa This class represents a workflow engine in the Bossa workflow library.
BossaFactory This class handles the creation of a Bossa instance.
BossaTransaction This class represents all transactions applied to a Bossa engine.
DeterministicTimeSource This class implements a deterministic time source.
RealTimeSource This class implements a real time time source.
 

Exception Summary
BossaException This class represents an exception of the Bossa system.
PersistenceException This exception is thrown if an error occours when making an update persistent.
